column5: Emerald Farms is about an hour outside downtown Houston. Set on a quiet, slightly rolling street, EF offers all the comforts of home in your own private barndominium. The rustic equestrian style barn home offers 2 bedrooms and a full bath, complete with a kitchen with full size appliances. Every window has a view of the pasture or inside the barn. Enjoy the country life with horses, mini cows, and donkeys. In between 2 towns for easy shopping/dining. Jellystone fishing/waterpark on same street!
